        public void display(java.util.UUID[] viewers,
                    int map,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    byte[] rgb,
                    int videoWidth)
        Description copied from interface: io.github.bananapuncher714.radioboard.api.PacketHandler
        Displays a centered image to all viewers
        Specified by:
        display in interface io.github.bananapuncher714.radioboard.api.PacketHandler
        Parameters:
        viewers - The UUID of viewers
        map - The first map id; Increments afterwards
        width - The width in amount of maps
        height - The height in amount of maps
        rgb - The image in terms of Bukkit map colors
        videoWidth - The width in pixels of the image

      • display

        public void display(java.util.UUID[] viewers,
                    int map,
                    int width,
                    int height,
                    byte[] rgb,
                    int videoWidth,
                    int xOff,
                    int yOff)
        Description copied from interface: io.github.bananapuncher714.radioboard.api.PacketHandler
        Displays an image to all viewers with an offset
        Specified by:
        display in interface io.github.bananapuncher714.radioboard.api.PacketHandler
        Parameters:
        viewers - The UUID of viewers
        map - The first map id; Increments afterwards
        width - The width in amount of maps
        height - The height in amount of maps
        rgb - The image in terms of Bukkit map colors
        videoWidth - The width in pixels of the image
        xOff - The amount of pixels from the left the image should be displayed
        yOff - The amount of pixels from the top the image should be displayed
